text: Vincenzo Ceci (born 21 April 1964) is an Italian former cyclist. He competed in the sprint event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Italy Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:People from Ascoli Piceno Category:Sportspeople from Marche
title: Vincenzo Ceci
